Engines¶

Spectroscopy Engine¶

This module defines classes aid interfaces for X-Ray fluorescence.

Centering Engine¶

@author: michel

Scanning Engine¶

class bcm.engine.scanning.AbsScan(mtr, start_pos, end_pos, steps, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

An absolute scan of a single motor.

class bcm.engine.scanning.AbsScan2(mtr1, start_pos1, end_pos1, mtr2, start_pos2, end_pos2, steps, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

An Absolute scan of two motors.

class bcm.engine.scanning.CntScan(mtr, start_pos, end_pos, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

A Continuous scan of a single motor.

class bcm.engine.scanning.GridScan(mtr1, start_pos1, end_pos1, mtr2, start_pos2, end_pos2, steps, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

A absolute scan of two motors in a grid.

class bcm.engine.scanning.RelScan(mtr, start_offset, end_offset, steps, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

A relative scan of a single motor.

class bcm.engine.scanning.RelScan2(mtr1, start_offset1, end_offset1, mtr2, start_offset2, end_offset2, steps, cntr, t, i0=None)¶

A relative scan of a two motors.

exception bcm.engine.scanning.ScanError¶

Scan Error.

Fitting Engine¶

bcm.engine.fitting.histogram_fit(x, y)¶

calcfwhm(x,y) - with input x,y vector this function calculates fwhm and returns (fwhm,xpeak,ymax, fwhm_x_left, fwhm_x_right) x - input independent variable y - input dependent variable return ymax, fwhm, xpeak, x_hpeak[0], x_hpeak[1], cema cema is center of mass

success boolean

bcm.engine.fitting.peak_fit(x, y, target='gaussian')¶
Returns the coefficients for the target function
0 = H - Height of peak 1 = L - FWHM of Voigt profile (Wertheim et al) 2 = P - Position of peak 3 = n - lorentzian fraction, gaussian offset

Success (boolean)
